pr_title: CorfuStore: Add epoch, CLEAR to streaming API

timeline.message:
CorfuStore: Add epoch, CLEAR to streaming API

Consumers of the streaming api need the epoch to
reconstruct the token that represents a Corfu snapshot.
So modify streaming api to support epoch info too.

Table.clear() is a supported UFO operation.
This must be sent to streaming api too so that it can
be handled appropriately.

timeline.bodyText: You might want to throw an exception on the default path, and have an explicit delete.
timeline.author: vjeko
